results.content: Great course! Very helpful! I’ve just started to learn web development, and it explains me everything, every concept on practice.
results.content_html: Great course! Very helpful! I’ve just started to learn web development, and it explains me everything, every concept on practice.

results.content: Interesting, very interesting I'd say. Nice and pleasant voice's telling you about the difficult things by using the simplest words and creating easy-to-learn constructions very good for beginners. I wish I could back to my past to start with this course and not waste my precious time for expensive books and other systems, because there's everything one should know about HTML and CSS and when it's complete juniors will be ready for tough but fascinating work in making websites. If you know nothing for now just follow the master and results won't be long in coming but if you're simply planning to refresh your knowledge like me, it will be enough one hour to remind everything important and brush up on IT. Hope I'll see more courses from the instructor, it's always good to write some blind spots in and create strong mind structure.

response.content: Thank you for your rating! I'm glad that you enjoyed taking this course!
response.content_html: Thank you for your rating! I'm glad that you enjoyed taking this course!
